name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ChatGPT - Explain in context right-click shortcut

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shortcut to facilitate using ChatGPT to explain something in context. To use, highlight a snippet of text on the website.â€¦

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shortcut to facilitate using ChatGPT to explain something in context. To use, highlight a snippet of text on the website. Right-click, select the "ChatGPT: Explain ..." option.

The tool will simply:

(A) Copy the below text to your clipboard.
"
Context: <Full sentence/paragraph of highlighted text>
Explain what <highlighted text> means in the context above
"

(B) Open ChatGPT on another tab, so that you can paste (Ctrl + V) the copied text there and use ChatGPT.
